text: The Southern Metropolitan Region is an electoral region of the Victorian Legislative Council, the upper house of the Victorian Parliament. It is located in the southern part of Melbourne. The region includes the Legislative Assembly (lower house) electoral districts of Albert Park, Ashwood, Bentleigh, Brighton, Caulfield, Hawthorn, Kew, Malvern, Oakleigh, Prahran and Sandringham. It is the richest electoral region in Victoria. ==Election results== ==References== Category:Electoral regions of Victoria Category:2006 establishments in Australia
title: Southern Metropolitan Region
